name: Fugiunt
description: THIS IS A PROTOTYPE Charge into a group of enemies and launch them back to their maker!  Just wondering if people thought this concept was fun. If you think that is either true or false please do let me know in the comments. How To: Push enemies into walls or other enemies to damage them.  Controls: Mouse - Aim WASD - Movement Tap left shift - Quick dash that gives some immunity Hold left shift - Charge dash also gives immunity Spacebar - Short dash Tips: You can chain quick dashes together. Using the short dash whilst charging can be an effective way to manoeuvre out of a difficult situation. Enemies can shoot each other so keep that in mind. The game seems to lag on chrome, using Microsoft Edge fixes that. Thanks for checking the game out!
